algorithm_technique: Pattern recognition and mathematical formula derivation
problem_summary_simple: Color cells in a grid starting from one, expanding to adjacent cells each minute.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate total cells colored after n minutes, where coloring expands to adjacent cells each minute from an initial cell.
key_insights: The pattern of colored cells forms a diamond shape expanding outwards.
The total number of cells can be calculated by summing two arithmetic progressions or by observing the pattern of squares.
The formula n^2 + (n-1)^2 directly counts the cells.
